Text saved: "The Life of Pi" is a book. It tells a very special story about a young boy from India. His name is Pi. His ship sinks in the Pacific Ocean. He is on a small boat with a big tiger. Yann Martel wrote the book. He is a writer from Canada. He wrote it in 2001. It was his third book. The book is very popular. It sold more than seven million copies in the world. It also won many prizes. People translated it into 41 languages. Martel's father was a diplomat. A diplomat is a person who works for their country in other countries. So, when Martel was a child, he lived in Costa Rica, Canada, France and Mexico.
